title: I won’t accept any post in new Cabinet - Sarath Weerasekara
body_lines: Former Minister of Public Security Sarath Weerasekera said he had decided not to take up any post in the new Cabinet.

"I have always stood for the unity of the country, the Buddha Sasana and the people and I will continue to do my duty for the nation and for the people. Due to the current crisis in the country, i have decided not to take up any post in the new cabinet, " he said.(DSB)
